alert.note: Alert for Fillmore (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 5:47PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT FILLMORE COUNTY THROUGH 615 PM CDT... At 547 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Shickley, or 34 miles south of York, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Geneva and Strang around 555 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for south central and east central Nebraska.
